data_table.description: Subject ID, consent group, subject source, source subject ID, and affection status of participants with or without lung cancer and involved in the "National Cancer Institute (NCI) Genome Wide Association Study (GWAS) of Lung Cancer in Never Smokers" project.

variable.name: CONSENT
variable.description: Consent group as determined by DAC

variable.name: SUBJECT_SOURCE
variable.value: Roy Castle Lung Cancer Research Program, University of Liverpool, UK
The University of Texas MD Anderson Cancer Center
Samuel Lunenfeld Research Institute, Toronto, Canada and University of Toronto, Toronto, Canada
Wayne State University School of Medicine, Karmanos Cancer Institute, Detroit, MI

variable.name: SOURCE_SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: Subject ID used in the Source Repository

variable.name: AFFECTION_STATUS
variable.description: Case control status of the subject
